description: The Hong Kong Arts Centre is an arts organisation that promotes contemporary arts and culture within Hong Kong and beyond. It provides programmes featuring local and overseas artists that cover a wide range of art forms including, media, visual and performing arts, theatre and film.

description: Artshare is the first global online platform dedicated to the exhibition and sale of modern and contemporary Asian art. Artshare presents critically curated online exhibitions, and offers the opportunity for private personal viewings. Artshare also provides a private sales avenue, working with collectors to source or sell major artworks.

description:
The Standard is the only free local English paper, and its magazine publications.
Topics spanned from health, education, food and wine, wedding to business services. The paper is available at http://www.thestandard.com.hk/

Artalk is a pioneering website and magazine project dedicated to art review. It is the first platform in Hong Kong opened to writers of any background and education to review art exhibitions extensively.
